title: Tina Swithin & Antisocial Personality Disorders
description:
Lala reveals more details about the upcoming “Give Them Lala Tour,” and answers your voicemails about the best way to support recovering alcoholics in your family/friends circle, new GTL merch, and Give Them Lala Beauty. She’s also seeking some advice on how to get to Ocean to stop biting! And Tina Swithin, founder of “One Mom’s Battle” and author of “Divorcing a Narcissist” joins to recount her own very personal story, and offer advice and tips on navigating divorce, the family court system, and recognizing narcissism, borderline, and antisocial personality disorders.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Lala Kent | Cumulus Podcast Network
